prompt: Stop motion felt and wool, a tiny handcrafted felt character sits at a miniature desk typing on a tiny laptop, steam rises from a felted coffee cup, the desk lamp is made of buttons and wire, warm golden light, Wes Anderson symmetry, the character occasionally looks up and blinks. Nikon macro lens, shallow DOF.

VHS camcorder footage from 1993, a teenager sits at a glowing CRT computer in a dark bedroom at 3am, the monitor light paints their face blue-green, posters on the wall, empty soda cans, the VHS tracking wobbles periodically, dated warm color cast, timestamp reads 03:47 AM in the corner. Pure nostalgia.

Steadicam tracking shot following a person walking through a rain-soaked neon-lit Tokyo alley at night, cherry blossoms falling through the rain, puddles reflect pink and blue neon, lanterns sway, steam rises from a ramen shop, Kodak Vision3 500T film stock, anamorphic lens flares, shallow depth of field.

Claymation, visible fingerprints on clay, a small clay creature builds a clay city brick by brick, each building rises from its clay hands, the city grows around it, warm kiln lighting, handmade miniature set with real wood table surface visible, Wallace and Gromit quality stop-motion feel.

Underwater photography, a person in a flowing white dress sinks slowly through turquoise water, sunbeams pierce through the surface creating god rays, bubbles trail upward, hair flows like seaweed, fabric billows in slow motion, shot from below looking up at the surface. Ethereal, serene, Kodak Ektachrome E100 slide film colors.
